website_summaries.verdict: Female superhero costumes are always popular for Halloween, and Wonder Woman is a positive role model.
pros: Very flattering fit when sized properly
Authentic Wonder Woman design and accessories
cons: Not comfortable to wear, tight fit and wire supports

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my costume!!! I feel sexy but not slutty, is the perfect outfit for Halloween. It looks exactly like in the picture :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend ordering this classing take on Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to San Diego Comic Con 2017 and it was ALL the rage! I highly recommend ordering this classing take on Wonder Woman. Plus, you get a little push up from the corset so the tatas look great! ;) Note: the corset fastens in two different sizes. I ordered a medium due to my bust size (36DD) and could have gone with a small fastened on the largest size. Enjoy the costume and save some lives you beautiful Amazonian Warrior!
customer_reviews.author: Cicely

customer_reviews.title: Great costume! I bought it for a photo shoot
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! I bought it for a photo shoot. I didn't use the cape and I added the rope. The bracelets were a little large but clamps helped give it a snug appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Thrower

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!!! It is sexy and very well made!! I am 136 pound for 5’3’’ and 36C and it fixes perfectly
customer_reviews.author: MaraTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Absolutely no complaints. I'm 5'6 and 128lbs. I bought the stockings at a local Halloween store, and bough red wedges to wear. The costume fits me everywhere very nicely, and I can't wait for Halloween :)
customer_reviews.author: kat warrington

customer_reviews.title: I liked this but ended up going with a different outfit ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this but ended up going with a different outfit for my Nephew's Super Hero themed birthday party. I wanted to leave a review though as some taller, like me (5'9") reported the corset being a little short. I actually didn't find that to be an issue and felt the corset was comfortable and stayed as it should. I am a 29 waist, 34 C bust and felt the fit was perfect. The skirt is thin and short and my plan had been to wear metallic red leggings under or you could wear shorts as well. I do have rather small wrists so the cuffs were a bit loose but overall I thought it was a great costume.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie_Chan

customer_reviews.title: It is alright
customer_reviews.text: Im 5'1, 105-110 pounds, and 34b-34c (depending on the bra brand). The costume came in a typical package you get when you buy a costume at a costume shop. It was an alright costume but it was a little too big for me.The corset itself was riding up. I fixed this problem by wearing a strapless bra underneath and connecting the clear straps (from the costume) onto the bra.
customer_reviews.author: wondergal

customer_reviews.title: I do like this costume
customer_reviews.text: I do like this costume, it meets expectations. But some minor things... THe belt doesn't have a point on it. Mine is just like a flat across belt. The head piece has smeared paint on it. The corsette is large, for sure. The size medium fits my 36B boobs, but I'm 5'5", 134 lbs, about a size 7, and the waste part is long and large, so if I had a bigger belly and longer torso it would fit perfectly. I think size 8-10 woman would fit in the medium perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and great fit. I ordered the small and it fits true to size. (I'm a size 4 and small top 5'7) I can't wait to put this to use at our Halloween party! Love this costume and everything about it. The corset fits and feels nice w/ thigh high attachment clips (will be getting white or red), headpiece is comfortable and the skirt is super cute. I don't mind that the cuffs are silver and not gold it's kind of a nice contrast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the corset, hate the skirt.
customer_reviews.text: I got this costume specifically for the cute corset that it comes with, knowing fully that I was planning on getting a completely different skirt, cape and accessories. And when it arrived I was right because the skirt is cheap and short and way too small, but the corset is very adorable and you could make your own spin on your costume with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mellopez

customer_reviews.title: Love it overall and ordered a medium to be more ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small and it fit me, yes, but felt too tight and revealing. We want to be a superhero family for Halloween with our baby, and since we are nursing the top/specifically the cup parts are way small. I'm 5'1 & 125lbs. Love it overall and ordered a medium to be more comfy! The corset is nice because it has 2 rows of clasps which means you can wear loose or tight. Skirt is short but looks great especially with tights or shorts under. I can wear this again in years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mae Green

customer_reviews.title: very small in the chest
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this costume, but the size small is clearly for an A cup. Since mine are between a C and a D it was a no go. Also the clear shoulder straps are really tight and super cheesy looking. Red stockings are not included so the black straps coming from the skirt have nothing to connect to unless you get something separately.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This costume is cute and comfortable. The skirt is very short, so you’d probably want tights and/or shorts underneath. I am 5’ 1” and 110 lbs (measurements are 33-27-36) and the Small fit well with some room to stretch. I ended up going with a different outfit (a one piece with a more iconic look) but I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: I love it, looks reAlly good
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Only reason i gave 4 stars is beacause it didn't come with the head piece but they are sending it to me 2 days from now. Overall it looked really great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this costume. I am a 34DD and almost got a small because that's usually my size but after reading the reviews I went a size up because of the bust size and I am very glad I did. It wasn't incredibly small but it definitely doesn't cover much, however, I think that's the point of this costume. Other people didn't like the headband... Mine stayed in just fine with a couple of Bobby pins and everything else fit as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Maria A

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the cups come small. I'm using a size medium
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Use the size chart
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this outfit. It looked adorable on my wife. Her red over the knee boots I bought her from Amazon looked great with this too. I bought her wonder woman dilly duds short shorts to go beneath the skirt that came with this outfit. The skirt, corset, & cape that came with this fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D. Shenberger

customer_reviews.title: Not the same w/o the stockings
customer_reviews.text: I thought the costume came with the stockings but that's I guess something I didn't read. The costume is true to size and looks great on but the stockings do make a difference and when I went to other costume shops it was all sold out so I had to wear a another girl superhero stockings. I gave it 4 stars only because I think the stockings should be included. Well made product though.
customer_reviews.author: Vanne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Form to Body - Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this costume unless you just plan to wear it at home. I don’t know how it fits anyone. I ordered a medium based on reviews, and it was too big. But, I don’t think a small would’ve fit anyway. The cups push away from the body - even with the clear plastic straps on. I like the skirt better than another costume I bought, but that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this costume, however I had to return it because the skirt was super short. Also the bust in made for someone who is C cup or up. I'm not an easy size to fit so I cant blame the costume. I'm 5'7 34-25-40. Its a very cute cheap costume. I love the little cape. Looks like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting the quality I got with this costume for the price I paid. The corset is very sturdy and the wiring doesn't bend outward on the sides like a lot of cheap corsets do. It comes with all the pieces shown in the picture except for the stockings and heels. If you were to go to a Spirit store or something similar, you would be paying $60-$80 easily. I wore it to a Halloween festival and got a lot of compliments on it; would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carli Stack

customer_reviews.title: Too big. Too short.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, but the skirt is too short, so short, I could see my underwear. Had to modify it. Created another skirt to put underneath, also, created the golden eagle, and made it smaller, fit me like a plastic bag before. Too big.
customer_reviews.author: Heidy Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Hannah
customer_reviews.text: I loved the costume itself, but I'm a size 6-8, which says medium on the website, but the bustier was really big on me, as were the cuffs that you're supposed to put on your arms. Would've fit perfectly if I'd gotten the small, but I guess that's the nature of ordering online (plus, I was a total procrastinator in ordering my costume, so didn't have time to return it for a smaller size before Halloween). Definitely recommend this costume in general, but the size chart is a little off. The good news is that the belt and a super push-up bra helps! :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hausman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a small, top was too large and bottom was too small (5'6", 130lb). Not too surprised based on previous reviews but still disappointed. Quality was on the cheaper end, but comparable for price. Ended up buying each element of the WW costume separately from amazon and it looked quite good!
customer_reviews.author: KMiddle

customer_reviews.title: Bra fitting issues
customer_reviews.text: The bra part doesn't fit larger breasts. I got a small because that's the size of my torso, but my boobs had no hope of ever staying in the built in bra. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: VSimm

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but shows a lot of skin.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I am returning it just because I person didn't feel very comfortable with how much skin it shows, but that might be what you are looking for. To me this is more of a fetish costume rather than a Halloween one BUT, again, that's just my personal opinion, it's very pretty and might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's like they increased the size of the bodice but not ...
customer_reviews.text: this is not the costume for me if you are larger than a small B cup. 5'6" 150 lbs 34DD ordered a size large and the bodice fits but the cups are about half the size they should be. It's like they increased the size of the bodice but not the cups. I couldn't wear it at all. On the plus side the headbank and belt were super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Halloween. Ever. You'd never think I had a baby 4 months prior to rocking this beautiful costume. The color, quality and fit are exceptional. Thank you for making my daughter's first Halloween a huge success!
customer_reviews.author: esan fullington

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: AYY I loved this product. Usually nothing fits me because I'm quite small but everything fit me. That being said, if you're a girl with a larger bust I'd factor that into the size you by. Really the costume is true to the measurements besides the bust. The short was a little bit tiny but that's pretty expected with women's Halloween costumes at this point. I'd recommend getting shorts to go under it. It comes with a lot of stuff for the costume and it is pretty well made. The corset is actually better than some corsets or bras I've bought that aren't costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have super small boobs you will fall out of the top. Maybes that is the point? I am a 32dd and it was way too small. Also it's for someone tall...skirt looked long on me. I am 5'4". It is made well and the fabric was nice. I returned it due to fit.
customer_reviews.author: champt02

customer_reviews.title: I'd find a better wonder woman costume somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: This is the most confusing costume it's too short length wise and doesn't fit over my belly but it's too big around and isn't tight enough and doesn't fit my boobs at all. Costume doesn't completely match up with picture.also doesn't come with stockings. I'd find a better wonder woman costume somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2 about 120 I got the x-small fit perfectly so make sure you order your size it fits skin tight - also the skirt is much shorter than expected i wore shorts underneath. Worth the money it’s amazing quality you can wear this costume several years in a row and it would hold up !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The costume looks amazing with high quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5'1 and a x-small fits perfectly on me! The costume looks amazing with high quality. I am surprised and very satisfied about the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife and it looked great on her. Only issue is with the clips that hold the stockings up. They’re made from a cheap rubber instead of metal or hard plastic. They’d pop open every time she sat down. I’d recommend either buying thigh high stockings that stay up on their own or nylons/leggings. Otherwise it was a great costume for the money
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great costume that's more conservative than one with the short ...
customer_reviews.text: Great costume that's more conservative than one with the short shorts, but I wore red boots and a more custom cape with it for a company party. I got many compliments on it and will wear it again to other parties next year! I'm 5' 2", 125 lbs, size 4, 34C and wore a size small. Everything fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, runs slightly small.
customer_reviews.text: This item was nicer than the other wonderwoman costumes- going forward I would opt to buy the separates. The skirt was just a bit too small. If you are in the cusp between small and medium go medium. For reference, I had to buy a small in the other Wonder Woman (1 piece) costume. This one is better quality also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute if you aren't picky
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute costume! I was a little disappointed in the quality of the fabric, and the headband. The headband that comes with it is NOT as pictured- instead of having a point on the head band, it was completely rounded - and didn't look as cute as the picture. It was also hard to get the tights in the garter pieces, and they sometimes came out on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Jean

customer_reviews.title: Pretty to look at!
customer_reviews.text: I have waited a long time to have the guts to pull off the Wonder Woman costume. I received this costume and at first sight it was beautiful! I wore it this weekend, and have to say I am highly disappointed in the quality. My belt is already pulled apart at the seams, after one night. Also, the corset style top makes assets look amazing, but the wire inside the top bends once you sit down and then you are stuck with a warped top for the rest of the night. I don't recommend sitting down in this costume, or doing anything at all in it really. It is very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: joemama

customer_reviews.title: It's just awesome, really good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's just awesome, really good quality, the only thing is that I ordered a xs because I jus 5"00 ft and 1,15 and the cup of the corset it's so tight because I'm cup c , but it's incredible how it fits
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the wrist bands aren't silver they're gold. The cape has a patch that's sewed over the logo which is not the same like the pic on the package. The corset leaves an open space in the chest area once it's put on and the clear straps are not easy to expand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best custom ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an amazing custom! By far the best custom I've ever had and for a great price! It looks super hot and fits well, though I do understand why it ran too big for some people. I am 111ilb with D cap so Small was good for me, but if you have a smaller cup, Xsmall is the right size if your wieght is similar to mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Perlman

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy
customer_reviews.text: This costume is super cute but it is definitely not for someone who values comfort. The corset wasn't too tight but the ribbed sides dig into the skin below my armpits. It's not easy to sit in and even makes the ribbed sides of the corset bend. The skirt was a good size for me, even though I am pretty curvy. All the acccesories are great. All in all a sexy costume but not worth it to me because of how uncomfortable it was.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie D.

customer_reviews.title: I loved this costume
customer_reviews.text: I loved this costume. It was SO cute. I am 5'2" and 130 pounds and I ordered a small. The costume fit well, but I should have ordered a medium because it was so tight around my underarms. I thought about just toughing it out, but decided to return for comfort. :( I would purchase again in a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I feel sexy but not slutty!
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume! I'm 125 lbs and 5'3. I ordered a size small and it even is flattering around/hides my post baby belly (son is 3 months and I still have a little pudge) I would've given it five stars if the cape hadn't ripped around the Velcro when I put it on but luckily I can sew.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, not too cheesy
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, not too cheesy. Be prepared though, the sizes are way small. My wife is 34d and we ordered medium which was hopelessly too small.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm GrangerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect highly recommend. I looked at a ton of different outfits and i was so happy i ended up getting this one because it fit perfect i'm 5'4 and 125 lbs. Loved it worked out perfect! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sydni

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS! It’s very cheap material and made it look like I was wearing a garbage bag. It was too big and just looked super awkward. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: corset was damaged
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was very disappointed after getting my costume. I have been waiting for it to arrive all week only to open it and find a stain/miscoloring on the top. It's not very large but is right in the middle or the corset. I'm going to wear it tonight since I Dont have a back up but am very disappointed and would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Agata

customer_reviews.title: Got lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5” and 150 lbs and ordered a medium!! Fit well, great support and cute!! Skirt was a bit short so wore with leggings and thigh high heeled boots, cute!! Wore to a Comic Con and got lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to return
customer_reviews.text: Top was too small and did not cover enough on the top. NOTE - returns to this company are VERY DIFFICULT. I bought 3 costumes. the first 2 were easy to return. This one has a 2 page instruction sheet and you have to jump through all sorts of hoops to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Laren J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks better if you order the boots to go with it
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Looks better if you order the boots to go with it. Almost a perfect match to the toddler costume- we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this costume! I was a bit skeptical about ordering a costume without trying it but this one fit perfectly. I got SO many compliments on this costume; especially from families and kids who thought it looked really cool and realistic! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Nice costume
customer_reviews.text: Nice costume. I ordered a small. It fit a little big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great especially if you’re only using for a day
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! Cuffs were a little big but I easily fixed it by sowing it to my size
customer_reviews.author: Shayywayy

customer_reviews.title: Fun costume for Halloween party
customer_reviews.text: This costume looked amazing, came with all pieces in package, and was very comfortable!! Only downside was it was a tad big for me in the bust area but that was not a big deal!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Elizabeth Manzano

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is incredibly soft and comfortable, great quality costume. It fits just as expected. It is so comfortable, I could wear it all day. I love love love every bit of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume. I’m 5’8 and about 118, fit true to size and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: CGie

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items - headband & wrist gauntlets
customer_reviews.text: The costume itself appeared exactly like it appears in the picture, minus the headband and wrist gauntlets (which tend to be a common complaint within these reviews) For the price, the quality is what you'd expect. It's not a "true" corset as in the sense the latches are made if plastic so they can't really take much tension. I went a size up (medium) to accommodate my bust.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great (skirt is SMALL)
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I’m obsessed with this costume. I’m 5’ 3” and 110lbs and it fits perfectly. The skirt is RIDICULOUSLY small though. I didn’t have a huge issue with it bc I put navy volleyball shorts underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this costume for a Halloween party. She liked it. I liked it too.
customer_reviews.author: acowlaughing

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Comfortable for 1 Day
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1 130lbs 34C & medium was comfortable & fitted. Skirt is a bit short but ok if you're under 5'3. Overall I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: AVS

customer_reviews.title: I like it and especially like it on my wife
customer_reviews.text: Not for me, but my wife who loved it and yes, she looked great in it... fantastic for Halloween or any other special costume event. Comes complete and ready. No shoes or stockings (from memory) but everything else is there..
customer_reviews.author: ThaisMayaOfficial / Zefa Real

customer_reviews.title: Wife was really happy with the quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Wife was really happy with the quality and fit, especially me. She did mention that the front was not much supportive if you're busty. And if you plan to wear it for more than 2 hours it's best to use a under body suit or 1 piece bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Ray from Anaheim CA

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this costume
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this costume ! I got so many compliments on it . I even won 1st place in the costume contest ! Definitely 5 stars the only thing I didn’t like was the skirt was super short and the bust area was tight but other than that it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! For the price, it's awesome! Pretty great quality and I got a lot of compliments! Skirt is definitely short but it was still great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: ... the right size but putting on the outfit was like putting on a fitted girdle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and it was the right size but putting on the outfit was like putting on a fitted girdle. Neither the less it still looked sexy on her and she was fine with it even though she needed help closing the back part. That's why i gave it 3 stars because i had to help lol
customer_reviews.author: JUGHEAD

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' and 125lbs and I ordered a medium. It just fits great. Since I am on the shorter end the skirt length wasn't a problem for me. The only thing that didn't fit were the silver arm bands. I'm a 32DD, so the chest part was an odd fit, but that was expected for my body type. Other than that, I love it. I got tons of compliments on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Twyman

customer_reviews.title: size D cup and it fit perfect! Had to wear it for work as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3 and 136lbs, size D cup and it fit perfect! Had to wear it for work as a bartender and it was a big money maker, plus comfortable to work in all night. As the review state...You NEED shorts or leggings underneath. Also stated in other reviews the red thigh's are not included.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S Joaquin

customer_reviews.title: It fit nicely on the waste
customer_reviews.text: These kinds of costumes are not mde for small, but larger top girls. It fit nicely on the waste, bit I kept feeling like my girls weee going to escape. If I go up a size, it would be too loose on the bottom. But I think that's how all of these costumes are.
customer_reviews.author: Just Visiting

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume fit perfectly and looks really cute. I decided to skip wearing the cape because it looks more authentic and just better in general without it. I got a ton of compliments and it was so fun to wear! It is also fairly comfortable. The price was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Netty

customer_reviews.title: not fitted for women’s bodies
customer_reviews.text: i’m basically a medium in everything but the corset part of the costume was just very ill fitting and didn’t sit properly on my body
customer_reviews.author: juliette

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Superhero Birthday Party and it really did the job. The corset was great, a bit big for my breast (I ordered a Large but I am a 34B cup), everything else fitted perfectly, the skirt, the cape and the other accesories.
customer_reviews.author: Gissell Ramírez Fariña

customer_reviews.title: Only downside for such nice costume. The costume does have quit a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality costume. My wife has 34DD with a 25” waist. For this we ordered the medium. It is fixable with a minor alteration. Bra area seems to have a cardboard inlay with padding. Only downside for such nice costume. The costume does have quit a bit of stretch to it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter76

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this costume. Very sexy without being too much. The corset made for a flattering fit. Many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Adriene

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical about ordering my costume online especially so close to Halloween but this was perfect!! I made sure to use a me
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I was skeptical about ordering my costume online especially so close to Halloween but this was perfect!! I made sure to use a measuring tape for bust, hip, waist size and matched it to their sizing chart and it turned out amazing. I highly suggest people do this before ordering. Now I can't wait to show it off! :D
customer_reviews.author: Jin-Ah Kim

customer_reviews.title: Both tiny in the breasts (barely covered nipple) but incredibly ...
customer_reviews.text: Both tiny in the breasts (barely covered nipple) but incredibly large corset. Slid up my body when I sat and ended up having he cups hit me in the neck. Weird sizing. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love the whole ensemble! Wish there were boots, but I have red knee hi boots anyway! The skirt is thin so I got hot pants from Hot Topic. I've considered wearing this again - it's fun!
customer_reviews.author: jeep girl 92

customer_reviews.title: loved most of it
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this costume, I tweaked it a bit tho, the wrist cuffs were way too loose so I fixed that with my sewing machine. I didn't like the skirt so much so I bought blue liquid leggings and wonder woman boots and it looked fantastic, I got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!  But go with smaller size.
customer_reviews.text: Love the costume! I'm usually a medium, but had to go with the small, especially the top/cups to get some support. I would order the smaller size. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it- I could give or take the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it- I could give or take the fact that the skirt has small elastic waistband, which folds down as I move- but I could stand to loose a few lbs too... I am 5'7" 165lbs
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great costume! Fit as expected and was very nice. I weigh 150 lbs --5'5 and ordered a Medium. I didn't like how the skirt wasn't attached to the corset, but it wasn't a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wonder Woman Project
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrific costume to wear in the 4th of July boat parade float in Cherokee Village Arkansas. I can wear it again several times for various events. WooHoo
customer_reviews.author: sailor lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for a Halloween costume. The skirt is super short, wore it with leggings.
customer_reviews.author: NoMoGO

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice costume for the price. Followed other reviews for sizing and it fit nicely. I actually think it's flattering. It is short, so I used shorts with it. I wouldn't use the cuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Loved the costume. Sexy. Skirt is short. I wore shorts underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Ashley

customer_reviews.title: To small in boob area
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5 and about 125 with full C, VS says D, boobs. Everything fits well except the boob area, I ordered a small. I suggest people with larger boobs go up a size
customer_reviews.author: kelsea graff

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: The headpiece was not like the photo. IT was cheap, star did not have a black outline and the star was coming off!!!!! The WW logo on the top and on the cape is only yellow it is NOT outlined in black The skirt has little stars and big stars VERY MISLEADING DETAILS FOR THIS COSTUME OVERALL IT FIT NICE BUT THE SKIRT IS TOO SHORT. nEED TO WEAR TIGHTS SO MY ASS DOES NOT SHOW. BEWARE WHAT YOU BUY ON AMAZON-----MY FRIEND BOUGHT A SUNSCREEN THAT WAS EXPIRED!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ishak

customer_reviews.title: Missing Item
customer_reviews.text: Fits well but is missing one of the silver cuffs. Paid nearly $50 for the costume and it’s missing one of the main pieces. Not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great if you have a fuller chest (I'm a 32D ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" and 110 lbs and the corset was a bit large for a small, especially in the chest area. This is great if you have a fuller chest (I'm a 32D for reference) but the clear strap it comes with definitely helps keep the corset up if you don't fill out the corset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice costume!
customer_reviews.text: Cups were a tad small and the skirt is short but overall a really great costume!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Estelle

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this costume
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this costume! It fits well and is very cute. The skirt is a little bit shorter than it looks in the picture, still really cute! Would definitely recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: The material is very cheap. When the costume arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is very cheap. When the costume arrived, there was some random glue that stuck part of the corset thing to itself, and it ripped the fabric when I tried to pull it apart. The costume is very cute however, and I got a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small but still satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The size was SLIGHTLY on the small side but I'm making it work. In the reviews I've read about how short the skirt was, I purchased the star spandex shorts to accommodate. If you have a big backside, I suggest you do the same. Aside from that I am pleasantly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful costume, but the skirt is just too short
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 and a 137lbs. I bought the small and i was happy to see that it fit perfectly. My only issue is that the skirt is really short in the back. if you have a big butt be warned it will be hanging out in this.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Overall it was an okay costume. When I received it, it looked like it had been used by some else, so I went ahead and washed everything. Gross right? I got an XS but wished I would have sized up to a S.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This is ridiculous. I ordered a medium and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculous. I ordered a medium and it fits a 6 year old child. No kidding! Do they make it in adult sizes? Because the one they sent to me is definitely for a child, and the material is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Annah

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Headband
customer_reviews.text: All in all it’s a cute costume, but they sent me a headband that had got to be for a child or baby.
customer_reviews.author: jaxjayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Wonda Woman
customer_reviews.text: Came quick, and looks real good. Pretty good quality as well for price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Karahalis

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fit
customer_reviews.text: Skirt was a little shorter than expected, but overall the costume fit and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: cheyanne garcia

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: This is a great costume! It fits as expected and looks amazing. Everything about it is high quality and detailed, including the W on the neck of the cape.
customer_reviews.author: Yanks1

product_meta.title: DC Comics Secret Wishes Wonder Woman Corset Costume
product_meta.description: Secret wishes corset style costumes add a bit of sexy style to your superhero look. officially licensed costumes are available in sizes xs (0 to 2), small (2-6) , medium (6-10), and large (10-14). a world-leader in the creation of costumes, rubie's costume company is a family-owned and run business based in new york state. with more than 60 years experience and the largest selection, rubie's has the costumes and accessories children and adults want for halloween and year-around dress up fun.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Spot clean or hand wash as needed
Costume features sexy wonder woman corset
Includes corset, headpiece, skirt, gauntlets, belt, and cape
Look for all the dc comics and other superhero and supervillian costumes and accessories to create a fun group or family costume
Rubie's secret wishes line brings you costumes for playful adults all year long
